text.tutorial.intro1: Hello! Welcome to The Slash of the Dice!
text.tutorial.intro2: In this game, you must defeat endless waves of enemies while also enduring the test of luck!
text.tutorial.intro3: But before we get into all the little gimmicks of this game, you should learn how to actually play!
text.tutorial.intro4.desktop: If you need to take a break, you can pause the game by pressing the Escape key.
text.tutorial.intro4.mobile: If you need to take a break, you can pause the game by pressing the Pause button at the top right.
text.tutorial.intro5: You can exit the tutorial at any time by pressing "Return to Title" on the pause menu.
text.tutorial.movement.desktop: To move, use the W, A, S, and D keys. Try it out!
text.tutorial.movement.mobile: To move, use the thumbstick at the bottom left. Try it out!
text.tutorial.slash2: In this game, you have a slash ability. This ability lunges you forward and harms anything in its path!
text.tutorial.slash3.desktop: To use this ability, left click in the direction you want to slash!
text.tutorial.slash3.mobile: To use this ability, tap the Slash button at the bottom right while moving in the direction you want to slash!
text.tutorial.dice1: Good! Now, you'll learn about the mechanics of possibly the most common board game piece yet: dice.
text.tutorial.dice2: At the bottom right corner of your screen, you'll see a single die appear.
text.tutorial.dice3: These dice will determine how much your stats change by every time you kill an enemy!
text.tutorial.dice4: Oh, right! I almost forgot about the enemies. How could I forget those? They're a vital part of the game!
text.tutorial.dice5: Let's check them out, shall we?
text.tutorial.enemies1: Nearby, you'll see the enemy of the game! They would normally hurt you, but for the sake of the tutorial, I have frozen this one in place so it won't attack.
text.tutorial.enemies2: The more of these you kill, the higher your score goes! You can see your current score at the bottom left.
text.tutorial.enemies3: Your score right now is 0. Let's change that! Slash through the enemy until you defeat it.
text.tutorial.enemies4: Good! You may have noticed that you received a die when you killed the enemy.
text.tutorial.enemies5: It may have been good, or it may have been bad. It all comes down to luck!
text.tutorial.end1: The game spawns enemies, just like the one you just defeated, every few seconds. As the game progresses, these enemies get stronger until you eventually cannot defeat them anymore.
text.tutorial.end2: For the sake of the tutorial, the enemies' strength will not increase, and their attacks have been weakened.
text.tutorial.end3: The timer at the top shows how much time until the next enemy spawns. Once it reaches zero, another enemy spawns.
text.tutorial.end4: To complete the tutorial, defeat 5 more enemies!
text.tutorial.complete:
Good job!
You have completed the tutorial. Head back to the title to start playing!
